thread.title: UAE- RAK Ceramics opens regional office in Singapore
thread.title_full: UAE- RAK Ceramics opens regional office in Singapore | MENAFN.COM

author: Emirates News Agency (WAM)
title: UAE- RAK Ceramics opens regional office in Singapore
text:
(MENAFN - Emirates News Agency (WAM)) SINGAPORE 1st September 2015 (WAM) -- RAK Ceramics has opened a regional office in Singapore in order to enhance its presence in Asia and the Pacific. 
The opening of the Singapore office is part of the company's strategic development plan in which Singapore is considered to be strategically located to serve the Asia-Pacific region. 
Speaking on the occasion Abdallah Massaad Chief Executive Officer at RAK Ceramics said in a statement "The opening of a new office for the company in Singapore is an important step to promote growth in the Asia-Pacific region. Asia and the Pacific is a crucial market to help achieve this goal." 
He added that the company is looking to strengthen its partnerships with distribution channels in high-growth markets all over the world. 
WAM/Khuloud/Samar 

WAM/Moran
